titleStmt.title: A breviate of the prelates intollerable usurpations, both upon the Kings prerogative royall, and the subjects liberties. Published by W. Huntley, Esquier
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Newberry Library.
With: Briefe instructions for church-wardens and others to observe in all Episcopall or archdiaconall visitations and spiritual courts. [London? : s.n., 1637].
